title: Christmas Plans
alt: Physicists who want to protect traditional Christmas realize that the only way to keep from changing Christmas is not to observe it.
transcript:
[Cueball is standing behind a friend, who is sitting at a computer.]
Cueball: Hey, will you be in town the day after Christmas?
Friend: Couldn't say—
Friend: I'm Jewish.Cueball: But... how does being Jewish keep you from knowing your plans?
Friend: I know my plans—
Friend: I just don't know when Christmas is.Cueball: Really? Why not look it up?
Friend: Well, I'm also a physicist.Cueball: So?
Friend: I believe that since I don't observe Christmas, it can't have a definite date.
